pages.terms-conditions: TabTrove Terms and Conditions - Guidelines for Using Our Services TabTrove HOME ABOUT US Products Contact GET A QUOTE TabTrove Terms and Conditions Welcome to TabTrove! These terms and conditions ("Terms") outline the rules and regulations governing your use of our website (the "Service") operated by TabTrove ("us," "we," or "our"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access the Service. 1. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you are at least 13 years old and agree to be bound by these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify TabTrove immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach. 2. Use of the Service The Service is for your personal, non-commercial use only. You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that violates these Terms. By contributing User Content, you grant TabTrove a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, and distribute your User Content in connection with the Service. You retain all ownership rights to your User Content. However, you are responsible for ensuring that you have the rights to submit any User Content that you contribute to the Service. 4. Disclaimer THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. TABTROVE DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR VIRUS-FREE. TABTROVE IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CONTENT OR DATA LOST THROUGH THE USE OF THE SERVICE. 5.
